g.title: Sheet.1284
g.desc: High risk users must change password This policy forces users...
g.text: High risk users must change passwordThis policy forces users to change their password when signing in if high risk activity is detected for their account.

g.desc: Apply Level 2 APP data protection
g.text: Apply Level 2 APP data protection

g.title: Sheet.1289
g.desc: Require compliant PCs and mobile devices This policy enforces...
g.text: Require compliant PCs and mobile devicesThis policy enforces Intune management for PCs, phones, and tablets.

g.title: Sheet.1290
g.desc: Block clients that don’t support modern authentication Client...
g.text: Block clients that don’t support modern authentication Clients that do not use modern authentication can bypass Conditional Access policies.

g.title: Sheet.1292
g.desc: Require approved apps
g.text: Require approved apps

g.title: Sheet.1293
g.desc: Require approved apps This policy enforces mobile app protect...
g.text: Require approved appsThis policy enforces mobile app protection for phones & tablets.

g.title: Sheet.1294
g.desc: Require MFA when sign-in risk is low, medium, or high
g.text: Require MFA when sign-in risk is low, medium, or high

g.title: Sheet.1295
g.desc: Require multifactor authentication (MFA) when sign-in risk is...
g.text: Require multifactor authentication (MFA) when sign-in risk is medium or high

g.title: Sheet.1296
g.desc: Require MFA always This is also available for all Office 365 ...
g.text: Require MFA alwaysThis is also available for all Office 365 Enterprise plans.

g.desc: Phones and tablets include devices running the iOS, iPadOS, o...
g.text: Phones and tablets include devices running the iOS, iPadOS, or Android platforms

g.title: Sheet.1305
g.desc: Requires Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 E3 with the E5 Ident...
g.text: Requires Microsoft 365 E5, Microsoft 365 E3 with the E5 Identity add-on, Office 365 with EMS E5, or individual Microsoft Entra ID P2 licenses
